basic_info.description: I'm a Software Developer whose passion is solving problems with an emphasis on quality over quantity. I'm devoted to working with a team of like minded individuals who strive to bring excellent products, services and software to the consumer market. I'm an expert in product testing and quality assurance, skilled in information technology, familiar with PC hardware and knowledgeable of Microsoft and Ubuntu operating systems. Combined total of 16 years in the game development industry, 3 of which are developing projects using C# in the Unity game engine.

projects.title: Solid Sky: Combat Controller
projects.description: Solid Sky implements a player combat mode of which the player can toggle into at any time. It is complete with its own unique analog control system independent of the normal movement mode. The player character has full control of a functional, chainable attack system. There are literally dozens of attack combos classified by light, medium and heavy attack strings. Additionally, there are special moves and combo finishers such as the lunge kick, super kick, super punch, etc. The Animations themselves are selected from the Fighting Animset Pro asset available on the Unity Asset Store from the developer Kobold. The design, implementation, blending, animation controller, character controller and all its programming are my personal work.

projects.title: Hammerspace: Neon Sun
projects.description: Hammerspace: Neon Sun is a VR implementation of the modified Voxeland game asset, a voxel-based terrain system with a destructible mesh. In other words, you can carve into the terrain or do the opposite by building onto it. The project is functional on both the Vive and the Oculus Rift.

projects.title: Sphoid: Physics Based Self Driving Car
projects.description: The physics based self driving car showcases AI controlling a vehicle around a simple obstacle course while attempting to reach its moving target. The vehicle detects the environment in real-time making wheel torque and steering angle adjustments in order to reach its dynamic destination. This means it will actively avoid collision while tracking and attempting to reach a moving target.
